name: Holiday Inn Express Pinetop
description: Learn about Holiday Inn Express Pinetop
overview:
Discover exceptional hospitality in the heart of the White Mountains in Pinetop, AZ. Our stylish, contemporary Pinetop hotel offers premier amenities, friendly service and an ideal location for both the business traveler and leisure guest.

The Holiday Inn Express Pinetop Hotel offers the best value in accommodations. Whether your stay at our friendly hotel is a short or extended one our 73 beautiful guest rooms have all the modern conveniences including a microwave, refrigerator, cable TV with HBO, complimentary wireless and high speed internet, iron & board, hairdryer, coffee maker, an efficient business desk and more.

The Holiday Inn Express-Pinetop is your best bet when escaping to the cool White Mountains. Enjoy spacious rooms, daily complimentary deluxe breakfast bar, in-room refrigerator, microwave, and coffeemaker. Guests will also enjoy our indoor whirlpool, sauna, and exercise room, all conveniently located to the many activities in beautiful White Mountain region.
